verbs.description: [ARG1: US Steel stocks] [V: seem] [C-ARG1: to rise and fall with news of either a no - tariff or a tariff - on] . US Steel Corporation seems to be the most reactive stock in both directions . After putting tariffs on China , Trump is now slapping tariffs on steel and aluminum coming in from the EU .
